item.title: 任天堂对 Switch 2 的销量预期保守为 1,500 万台
item.description: 任天堂公司（Nintendo Co.）预计，Switch 2 的初期销量将低于预期，这反映出美国关税的不确定性正在如何拖累这家需求量创下历史新高的公司。【原文：Nintendo Co. projected weaker-than-expected initial sales of the Switch 2, a reflection of how uncertainty around US tariffs is weighing even on a company fielding record-setting demand.】

item.title: 信实寻求在媒体宣传中为 "辛杜尔行动 "注册商标
item.description: 亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）领导的信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）本周申请将 "辛杜尔行动"（Operation Sindoor）这一术语注册为商标，这是印度对巴基斯坦境内恐怖分子营地发动军事进攻的代号。【原文：Billionaire Mukesh Ambani-led Reliance Industries Ltd. moved to trademark the term ‘Operation Sindoor,’ the codename of India’s military offensive against terrorist camps in Pakistan this week.】

item.title: 英国 Centrica 公司将提高股息以应对贸易战
item.description: Centrica Plc 将增加本年度的股息，在监测贸易战对业务的影响的同时，提高对股东的回报。【原文：Centrica Plc will increase its dividends for the year, boosting returns to shareholders as it monitors the impact the trade war will have on the business.】

item.title: AIB 与爱尔兰政府进行 12 亿美元回购
item.description: 爱尔兰国际银行集团（AIB Group Plc）的董事会将着手从爱尔兰国家手中回购 12 亿欧元（14 亿美元）的股份，此前股东们已批准了这项交易，这将使该银行濒临完全私有化的边缘。【原文：AIB Group Plc’s board will proceed with a €1.2 billion ($1.4 billion) share buyback from the Irish state, after shareholders approved the deal that will put the bank on the brink of full private ownership.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行行长为支撑里拉的干预措施辩护
item.description: 土耳其货币局局长为央行最近几周出售数百亿美元储备以稳定里拉汇率的决定进行了辩护，面对政界人士的批评，他发出了挑衅的声音。【原文：Turkey’s monetary chief defended the central bank’s decision to sell tens of billions of dollars of reserves to stabilize the lira in recent weeks, striking a defiant tone in the face of criticism from politicians.】

item.title: 马士基因关税战下调全球集装箱市场展望
item.description: 丹麦集装箱巨头 A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S 下调了受唐纳德-特朗普贸易战影响的全球运输市场预期。【原文：A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S, the Danish container giant, lowered its forecast for the global transport market rattled by Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 哈利法克斯称英国房价三个月来首次上涨
item.description: 据英国最大的抵押贷款机构之一称，英国房价自 1 月份以来首次出现上涨，原因是面对更高的税率和更加黯淡的经济前景，需求被证明是有弹性的。【原文：UK house prices rose for the first time since January as demand proved resilient in the face of higher taxes and a gloomier economic outlook, according to one of Britain’s largest mortgage lenders.】

item.title: 美国加征关税前德国工业生产增长
item.description: 德国 3 月份的工业生产有所增长，在此期间，美国政府迫在眉睫的贸易壁垒可能促进了国外需求。【原文：German industrial production rose in March, a period in which looming trade barriers by the US administration probably boosted foreign demand.】

item.title: 对垃圾债务的渴求急剧上升，银行家们正在恢复生机
item.description:
在一系列交易被撤消或搁置之后，贷款人正在抓住令人欣慰的喘息机会。不过，这种情况可能不会持续太久，因为特朗普的关税政策仍然迫在眉睫。【原文：

Lenders are seizing on a welcome bit of respite after a number of deals were pulled or held. It may not last for long, though, as Trump’s tariffs still loom. 

】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国央行会议前的贸易协议前景提振英国股市
分析师称，印度央行大幅派息有助于抵消收入疲软的影响
item.description: 经济学家表示，印度央行预计将向政府支付创纪录的红利，以抵消经济增长放缓导致的税收缺口，并帮助满足任何紧急支出需求。【原文：India’s central bank is expected to pay a record dividend to the government, offsetting shortfall in tax revenues due to slow growth and helping meet any emergency spending needs, economists said.】

item.title: 关税不确定性导致英飞凌指导性业绩低于预期
item.description: 德国芯片制造商英飞凌科技公司（Infineon Technologies AG）预计本季度营收将低于分析师预期，并下调了全年业绩展望，此前该公司已将关税和汇率波动可能导致的营收下降考虑在内。【原文：Infineon Technologies AG forecast revenue in the current quarter will miss analysts’ expectations and cut its outlook for the year after the German chipmaker factored in potential declines due to tariffs and currency fluctuations.】

item.title: 美元走软，外国人买入 2.8 亿美元东盟股票，为七个月来最多
item.description: 随着对新兴市场的偏好提高和当地货币的走强，全球基金正在重新涉足东南亚股票市场。【原文：Global funds are dipping back into Southeast Asian equities as appetite for emerging markets improves and local currencies strengthen.】

item.title: OpenAI 聘请 Instacart 首席执行官 Fidji Simo 监管应用程序
item.description: 费吉-西莫（Fidji Simo）周三宣布加入 OpenAI，担任 OpenAI 应用首席执行官，向山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）汇报工作。【原文：Fidji Simo is joining OpenAI in a new role as chief executive officer of OpenAI applications, reporting to Sam Altman, he announced on Wednesday.】

item.title: 反对派抗议后，X 屏蔽了被监禁的土耳其市长的网页
item.description: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安的竞争对手、伊斯坦布尔市市长埃克雷姆-伊马莫格鲁被拘留，引发了全国范围的抗议活动。【原文：Social media platform X blocked the account of jailed Istanbul mayor Ekrem Imamoglu, a rival to Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan whose detention sparked nationwide protests.】

item.title: 滞胀，但现在这并不重要
item.description:
美联储落空： 在90天的暂停期结束之前，关税是所有人都想知道的事情。【原文：

The Fed falls flat: Tariffs are all anyone wants to know about until the 90-day pause expires.

】

item.title: 西门子能源公司预计进口关税影响有限
item.description: 西门子能源股份公司（Siemens Energy AG）撇开了美国对其他德国制造商征收关税的混乱局面，表示进口关税对其底线的影响很小。【原文：Siemens Energy AG shrugged off the US tariff chaos that’s hit other German manufacturers, saying that the effect of import duties on its bottom line will be small.】

item.title: 德意志银行通过新的交易团队加强国防金融业务
item.description: 德国最大的贷款机构德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的企业与投资银行业务负责人法布里齐奥-坎佩利（Fabrizio Campelli）表示，德意志银行已采取措施切实加强其在国防工业领域的风险敞口，包括成立一个专门负责此类交易的团队。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG has taken steps to meaningfully step up its exposure to the defense industry, including setting up a dedicated team to work on such deals, according to the head of corporate and investment banking at Germany’s largest lender, Fabrizio Campelli.】

item.title: 非洲开发银行候选人警告：特朗普削减援助威胁非洲增长
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划削减对非洲开发银行的数亿美元资金，这将打击非洲大陆的经济增长，非洲开发银行领导人候选人塞缪尔-迈博（Samuel Maimbo）说。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s plan to cut hundreds of millions of dollars of funding to the African Development Bank will hit growth on the continent, said Samuel Maimbo, a candidate to take over the leadership of the lender.】

item.title: 据称印度保险公司将寻求更宽松的债券远期规则
item.description: 印度保险公司在接受最近推出的债券远期交易之前，要求放宽监管，该交易旨在提高印度 1.4 万亿美元政府债务市场的流动性和复杂性。【原文：Indian insurers are asking for lighter-touch regulations before they embrace the recently introduced bond forwards, which are aimed at enhancing the liquidity and sophistication of the nation’s $1.4 trillion government debt market.】

item.title: 美国关税仍未确定，泰国为 "临时 "投资冻结做好准备
item.description: 由于全球贸易的不确定性，泰国的新外国直接投资可能会放缓，而这个东南亚国家正寻求与华盛顿谈判，以减轻 36% 关税威胁带来的打击。【原文：Thailand may see a slowdown in new foreign direct investments due to global trade uncertainties, while the Southeast Asian country seeks to negotiate with Washington to soften the blow from the threat of a 36% tariff.】

item.title: 中国钢铁机构称正在限制产量，铁矿石下跌
item.description: 铁矿石下跌，原因是中国最大的钢铁协会证实正在进行产量限制，而期待已久的中国人民银行降息也未能持续提振市场情绪。【原文：Iron ore fell as China’s top steel association confirmed that output curbs were underway, and long-awaited PBOC rate cuts failed to deliver a sustained lift in sentiment.】

item.title: 印尼储备因印尼盾问题创近两年最大降幅
item.description: 上个月，印尼央行加大了市场干预力度，以缓解下滑的印尼盾汇率，此后印尼的外汇储备出现了近两年来的最大跌幅。【原文：Indonesia’s foreign-exchange reserves saw the biggest drop in nearly two years after the central bank ramped up market intervention to cushion the sliding rupiah last month.】

item.title: Meta 赢得 1.68 亿美元的间谍软件大奖，怎能不令人欢欣鼓舞？
item.description:
该公司对 NSO 集团的胜利将震慑这个阴暗的行业，但不会扼杀它。【原文：

The company’s victory against NSO Group will deter this murky industry — but won’t kill it. 

】

item.title: 欧洲购买炮弹，军火制造商财富增至三倍，达 160 亿美元
item.description: 武器制造商米哈尔-斯特纳德（Michal Strnad）喜欢说自己从事的是国防事业。随着欧洲大规模重整军备，事实证明这是一个有利可图的地方。【原文：Weapons maker Michal Strnad likes to say he works in the business of defense. As Europe re-arms on a massive scale, it’s proving a lucrative place to be.】

item.title: 卡萨布兰卡交易所提供衍生品，摩洛哥寻求重返新兴市场
item.description: 作为 2030 年国际足联世界杯的北非联合主办国，摩洛哥计划很快在当地市场推出衍生品交易，以重新赢得新兴市场地位。【原文：Morocco plans to launch derivatives trading on its local market soon as the North African co-host of the 2030 FIFA World Cup seeks to win back emerging-market status.】

item.title: 英镑、英国富时指数期货在美英贸易协议有望达成之际上涨
item.description: 有报道称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普预计将在周三晚些时候宣布美英之间的贸易协议，英镑和富时 100 指数期货因此上涨。【原文：The pound and FTSE 100 stock-index futures rallied on a report that US President Donald Trump is expected to announce a trade deal between the US and UK later Wednesday.】

item.title: 台湾不希望被美国认定为汇率操纵国
item.description: 台湾中央银行行长否认了被美国财政部贴上汇率操纵国标签的可能性。【原文：Taiwan’s central bank governor dismissed the possibility of being labeled a currency manipulator by the US Treasury.】

item.title: 投资者对地缘政治紧张局势忧心忡忡，但历史表明股市可抵御冲突
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 家族办公室 NF Trinity 将进驻纽约，拓展美国市场
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，香港企业集团南丰集团旗下的金融投资和家族办公室南丰三一计划在纽约设立办事处，以发掘在美国的投资机会。【原文：Nan Fung Trinity, the financial investment and family office arm of Hong Kong conglomerate Nan Fung Group, is planning to set up an office in New York to tap investment opportunities in the US, according to people familiar with the matter.】
